description: Manage the checks that should be run on a machine by I(Sensu).

metric.description: Whether the check is a metric

subdue_begin.description: When to disable handling of check failures

occurrences.description: Number of event occurrences before the handler should take action

low_flap_threshold.description: The low threshhold for flap detection

publish.description: Whether the check should be scheduled at all.

custom.description: A hash/dictionary of custom parameters for mixing to the configuration.

source.description: The check source, used to create a JIT Sensu client for an external resource (e.g. a network switch).

state.description: Whether the check should be present or not

subdue_end.description: When to enable handling of check failures

handle.description: Whether the check should be handled or not

dependencies.description: Other checks this check depends on, if dependencies fail,

subscribers.description: List of subscribers/channels this check should run for

aggregate.description: Classifies the check as an aggregate check,

path.description: Path to the json file of the check to be added/removed.

standalone.description: Whether the check should be scheduled by the sensu client or server

handlers.description: List of handlers to notify when the check fails

refresh.description: Number of seconds handlers should wait before taking second action

command.description: Path to the sensu check to run (not required when I(state=absent))

high_flap_threshold.description: The high threshhold for flap detection

backup.description: Create a backup file (if yes), including the timestamp information so
